title: MotoGP.13.Complete.MULTi2-PROPHET
description:
3DM-PROPHET PRESENTS:

MotoGP 13 *Complete* (c) Milestone

release date ...: February 2768
protection
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/PL

2013 Riders, teams and tracks; both simulation  and
accessible  bike  handling  with   scalable   aids;
photorealistic graphics with  TV  style  interface;
ingame voice over by official MotoGP  commentators;
first person elements such as the helmet  view  and
3D pits to put you in the rider's  shoes.  This  is
MotoGP  13,  the  official  MotoGP  videogame:  try
Career Mode, rising from a Moto3  wildcard  to  the
MotoGP World Champion, or challenge your friends in
Split Screen or Online Championship.

This Complete Edition includes:

* MotoGP 13 (main game)
* 2012 Top Riders DLC
* Red Bull Rookies Cup DLC
* MotoGP Champions DLC
* Moto2 and Moto3 DLC

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the content of PROPHET dir to where you
have installed the game
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
This version is from retail  DVD  source.  We  have
included the DLCs from steam version of the game to
make it complete. Keep in mind that some of the DLC
content may not be translated to Polish
